sql.if: AND (record.product_name like concat('%',#{query.productName},'%') or record.product_name_en like concat('%',#{query.productName},'%') )

mapper.select: SELECT income.*, record.product_name, record.product_name_en, record.product_type, record.rate, record.product_term , record.hold_amount, record.coin, record.logo FROM financial_income_accrue income INNER JOIN financial_record record ON income.uid = record.uid and income.record_id = record.id where 1=1
SELECT sum(income.income_amount) FROM financial_income_accrue income INNER JOIN financial_record record ON income.uid = record.uid and income.record_id = record.id where 1=1

SELECT income.*, record.product_name, record.product_type, record.rate, record.product_term , record.hold_amount, record.coin FROM financial_income_accrue income INNER JOIN financial_record record ON income.uid = record.uid and income.record_id = record.id where record.uid = #{uid} and record.product_type = #{type}
